property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} Choose a creature in the battle zone and return it to its owner"s hand. Then that player chooses a creature in his hand that costs less than the chosen creature. That player may put that creature into the battle zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Fortress Whenever one of your Aliens leaves the battle zone, you may put an Alien psychic creature that costs less than that Alien from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone. property.name: Rules
property.value: (This spell is put into your mana zone tapped.) Put a psychic creature that costs 5 or less from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone. If you put a Light psychic creature into the battle zone in this way, you may add a card in your hand to your shields face down. If you put a Water psychic creature into the battle zone in this way, this turn, your creatures can"t be blocked.

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This spell is put into your mana zone tapped.) Put a psychic creature that costs 5 or less from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone. If you put a Light psychic creature into the battle zone in this way, you may add a card from your hand to your shields face down. If you put a Nature psychic creature into the battle zone in this way, you may return a card from your mana zone to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This spell is put into your mana zone tapped.) Put a psychic creature that costs 5 or less from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone. If you put a Water psychic creature into the battle zone in this way, this turn, your creatures can"t be blocked. If you put a Darkness psychic creature into the battle zone in this way, choose one of your opponent"s creatures in the battle zone. During your opponent"s next turn, that creature must attack if able.

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This spell is put into your mana zone tapped.) Put a psychic creature that costs 5 or less from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone. If you put a Darkness psychic creature into the battle zone in this way, choose one of your opponent"s creatures in the battle zone. On your opponent"s next turn, that creature must attack if able. If you put a Fire psychic creature into the battle zone in this way, one of your creatures in the battle zone can attack untapped creatures this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This spell is put into your mana zone tapped.) Put a psychic creature that costs 5 or less from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone. If you put a Nature psychic creature into the battle zone in this way, you may return a card from your mana zone to your hand.
